title: Return to service of a member who has vested benefit status
context: §88-97 Return to service of a member who has vested benefit status. If a former member who has a vested benefit status as provided in section 88-96(b) returns to service before the former member&rsquo;s retirement, the former member shall again become a member and shall contribute for membership service as provided by the law in effect during the member&rsquo;s reenrolled period of membership. Upon retirement, the member&rsquo;s benefit shall be the benefit computed with the member&rsquo;s combined service included under the formula in effect at the time of retirement. [L 1969, c 110, pt of §1; am L 1982, c 165, pt of §2(15); am L 2005, c 58, §13]
